scripts.dev:always-clean: npm run clean:win && timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul 2>&1 && npm run dev
scripts.clean:win: powershell -Command "Stop-Process -Name node -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path .next -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path node_modules/.cache -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
scripts.dev:clean: npm run clean:win && npm run dev
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean:win && npm run build
scripts.dev:safe: npm run clean:win && timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul 2>&1 && npm run dev
